name: WizWords
description:
A wizard dueling typing game!

For GMS2 BetaJam#2 using a pallet swap shader

How to play:

Type the word over you wizards head to block a spell.

Type the word of the enemy wizard's head to attack.

Update History:

14/07/2017 - Added Mac OSX Compile

01/03/2017 - Added screen shake when pressing wrong letters

24/02/2017 - Updated Binary to include better level progression

16/02/2017 - Uploaded Game Jam Entry
